get.summary: Parameters queries the parameters of the module.

post.summary:
UpdateParams defines a (governance) operation for updating the module
parameters. The authority defaults to the x/gov module account.

parameters.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.
parameters.name: body

ignitemychain.ignitemychain.v1.MsgUpdate.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.

authority.description: authority is the address that controls the module (defaults to x/gov unless overwritten).

params.description:
params defines the module parameters to update.

NOTE: All parameters must be supplied.

ignitemychain.ignitemychain.v1.MsgUpdate.description:
MsgUpdateParamsResponse defines the response structure for executing a
MsgUpdateParams message.

ignitemychain.ignitemychain.v1.Params.description: Params defines the parameters for the module.

ignitemychain.ignitemychain.v1.QueryPara.description: QueryParamsResponse is response type for the Query/Params RPC method.

params.description: params holds all the parameters of this module.
